metadata.description: MCP servers for life sciences research tools including 10x Genomics, PubMed, BioRender, Synapse, Wiley Scholar Gateway, bioRxiv, Clinical Trials, ChEMBL, Owkin, and Open Targets

plugins.name: 10x-genomics
plugins.description: 10x Genomics Cloud MCP server for accessing analysis data and workflows

plugins.name: pubmed
plugins.description: PubMed MCP server for searching biomedical literature and research articles

plugins.name: biorender
plugins.description: BioRender MCP server for creating and accessing scientific illustrations

plugins.name: synapse
plugins.description: Synapse.org MCP server by Sage Bionetworks for collaborative research data management

plugins.name: wiley-scholar-gateway
plugins.description: Scholar Gateway MCP server by Wiley for accessing academic research and publications

plugins.name: biorxiv
plugins.description: Access to bioRxiv and medRxiv preprint data

plugins.name: owkin
plugins.description: Interact with AI agents built for biology

plugins.name: open-targets
plugins.description: Drug target discovery and prioritisation platform

plugins.name: single-cell-rna-qc
plugins.description: Quality control for single-cell RNA-seq data following scverse best practices

plugins.name: instrument-data-to-allotrope
plugins.description: Convert instrument data to Allotrope Simple Model (ASM) format

plugins.name: nextflow-development
plugins.description: Run nf-core bioinformatics pipelines (rnaseq, sarek, atacseq) on local or public GEO/SRA sequencing data
